```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

# Number of compounds (including trace)
dat1 <- read_csv("results/ncompT_coef-summary.csv")
dat1 <- as.data.frame(t(dat1))

dat1 <- read_csv("results/ncompT_coef-summary.csv")
dat1 <- as.data.frame(t(dat1))
dat1 <- tibble::rownames_to_column(dat1, "VALUE")
names(dat1) <- dat1[1,]
dat1 <- dat1[-1,]

dat1[2:5] <- sapply(dat1[2:5], as.numeric)

dat1 <- dat1[c(1:4,8:11,5:7,12),]
dat1$coef <- c("Intercept", "SexM", "Juvenile", "Subadult", "Pasture (60km2)",
               "Sq Past (60km2)", "Intermix (100m, 60km2)", "Sq Intermix", 
               "Beech BAA", "Sq Beech BAA", "Beech Mast Index", "BeechBAA x BMI")

```


```{r,  echo=FALSE}
kab <- knitr::kable(dat1, caption="Ncompounds with trace",
                    booktabs=TRUE, lable="kable table1", digits=2)

kable_classic_2(kab, full_width=F, latex_options="hold_position")
```
